mapper.select: select rno, bno, content, writer, r.regdate from tbl_reply r, tbl_member m where r.writer = m.id and bno = #{bno} order by rno
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply(rno, content, writer, bno) values(seq_reply.nextval, #{content}, #{writer}, #{bno})
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno} and rno = #{rno}
